content.title: View the App
content.body:
1. Enter the following login credentials in your app.
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  2. Click Login.
    The Accounts List appears.
  3. Click Recipients.
    The Recipient list appears.
  4. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
    From the details page, you can delete the recipient.
    You will learn how to create and edit recipients in next hikes.
  5. To exit the app on your mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile device and click Exit App.
